    @allure.title("Caso 6.2: Navegación a Check-in y Personaliza tu Viaje")

    def test_navigate_to_checkin_and_customize(self, setup):
        """Navegar desde el navbar a Check-in -> Personaliza tu viaje"""
        browser = setup['browser']
        home_page = setup['home_page']
        video_recorder = setup['video_recorder']
        db = setup['db']
    
        logger.info("=== INICIANDO TEST 6.2: Check-in y Personaliza tu Viaje ===")
    
        try:
            # Paso 1: Volver a página principal
            with allure.step("Volver a página principal"):
                home_page.navigate_to("https://nuxqa4.avtest.ink/es/")
                home_page.wait_for_page_load()
                video_recorder.capture_frame(browser)
    
            # Paso 2: Buscar elementos de Check-in
            with allure.step("Buscar menú Check-in"):
                logger.info("Buscando elementos de Check-in...")
    
                checkin_selectors = [
                    "//*[contains(text(), 'Check-in')]",
                    "//*[contains(text(), 'check-in')]",
                    "//*[contains(text(), 'Checkin')]",
                    "//*[contains(text(), 'Reserva')]",
                    "//*[contains(text(), 'reserva')]",
                    "//a[contains(@href, 'check-in')]",
                    "//a[contains(@href, 'checkin')]",
                    "//a[contains(@href, 'reserva')]"
                ]
    
                checkin_elements = []
                for selector in checkin_selectors:
                    try:
                        elements = browser.find_elements(By.XPATH, selector)
                        checkin_elements.extend(elements)
                    except:
                        continue
    
                logger.info(f"Encontrados {len(checkin_elements)} elementos de Check-in")
    
                if not checkin_elements:
                    raise Exception("No se encontraron elementos de Check-in")
    
                # Filtrar visibles y seleccionar el primero
                visible_checkin = [elem for elem in checkin_elements if elem.is_displayed()]
                if not visible_checkin:
                    raise Exception("No hay elementos de Check-in visibles")
    
                main_checkin = visible_checkin[0]
                logger.info(f"✅ Elemento Check-in seleccionado: '{main_checkin.text}'")
    
            # Paso 3: Interactuar con Check-in
            with allure.step("Abrir menú Check-in"):
                video_recorder.capture_frame(browser)
    
                try:

                    time.sleep(2)
                except Exception as e:

                    try:
                        browser.execute_script("arguments[0].click();", main_checkin)

                        time.sleep(2)
                    except Exception as e2:

                                continue
